exceptions.tactic: intros K V a u n m.
intros K' V a u n m.
intros K' V' a u n m.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of sum_n_m_mult_l (sum_n_m (fun k : nat => mult _ (_ k)) _ _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment K : Ring V : ModuleSpace K a : K u : nat -> V n, m : nat H : forall (a : K) (u : nat -> K) (n m : nat), sum_n_m (fun k : nat => mult a (u k)) n m = mult a (sum_n_m u n m) Unable to unify "scal ?M2665 (scal ?M2666 ?M2667) = scal (mult ?M2665 ?M2666) ?M2667" with "iter_nat plus zero (fun k : nat => scal a (u k)) n m = scal a (iter_nat plus zero u n m)".

original: intros K V a u n m. unfold sum_n_m. rewrite sum_n_m_mult_l. apply scal_assoc.
